item.title: DataBases
item.description: Mongodb Enter mongo shell mongo 192.168.0.25 Start mongodb Upgrade brew upgrade mongodb brew info mongdb ln -s /usr/local/Cellar/mongodb/3.2.4/bin/* /usr/local/bin/ config: /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf, Dont forget touh /usr/local/var/log/mongodb/mongo.log filename: /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf systemLog: destination: file path: /usr/local/var/log/mongodb/mongo.log logAppend: true storage: dbPath: /Volumes/Home/Walter/mongodb net: bindIp: 192.168.0.99 manual start mongod --config /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf Mac autostart /Library/LaunchDaemons/org.mongo.mongod.plist filename: /Library/LaunchDaemons/org.mongo.mongod.plist <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.

item.title: Perl
item.description: Install perlbrew to Gentoo Linux Install to /opt/ export PERLBREW_ROOT=/opt/perl5 curl -L https://install.perlbrew.pl | bash perlbrew lib create base; Install Perlbrew to Mac OSX \curl -L http://install.perlbrew.pl | bash perlbrew available perlbrew install perl-5.23.3 perlbrew install-cpanm perlbrew lib create base; perlbrew switch perl-5.23.3@base Perl mysql utf8 First of all, make sure your locale is in UTF8 mysql /etc/my.cnf [client] default-character-set=utf8 [mysql] default-character-set=utf8 [mysqld] init-connect=’SET NAMES utf8’ collation-server = utf8_unicode_ci character-set-server = utf8 Perl script:
